#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,n,m,t,in1,in2;
	vector<int> v1(50001),v2(50001);
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%d",&(v1[i]));
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
			scanf("%d",&(v2[i]));
		in1=in2=0;
		while((in1<n)&&(in2<m))
		{
			if(v1[in1]>=v2[in2])
			{
				printf("%d ",v1[in1]);
				in1++;
			}
			else
			{
				printf("%d ",v2[in2]);
				in2++;
			}
		}
		while(in1<n)
		{
			printf("%d ",v1[in1]);
			in1++;
		}
		while(in2<m)
		{
			printf("%d ",v2[in2]);
			in2++;
		}
		printf("\n");
   }
}
